candidate Profile Description.summary: I am a skilled web developer and aspiring data scientist intern, passionate about creating engaging websites and analyzing data to drive insights and decision-making.

education.degree: License in Software Engineering and Information Systems

web_development: Java (JEE, Spring, Spring Boot, Gradle, Maven)

experience.title: End of Studies Project
experience.description: The project entitled 'E-Courrier' is the continuation of another electronic document management project aimed at creating, saving, classifying, and indexing electronic documents.

personal_projects.name: WEB/DESKTOP APPLICATION FOR INVOICE/ESTIMATE MANAGEMENT
personal_projects.description: WEB/Desktop application for managing invoices/quotes/stock. Management of customers, suppliers, and stocks. Generation of invoices, quotes 100% editable. Generation of the desktop application with ElectronJS.

personal_projects.name: TEXT SUMMARIZATION FOR SCIENTIFIC PAPERS
personal_projects.description: Text Summarization and Keywords Generation for research papers. Setting up the data and the sequence-to-sequence model. Training and testing the model with BERTScore. Deploying the model in Azure and using it with a frontend app.

personal_projects.name: BREAST CANCER DETECTION
personal_projects.description: Use of several machine learning algorithms to detect breast cancer. Data analysis with matplotlib. Training algorithms on data with sklearn.
